title: How to Fold a Cup from a Sheet of Paper

steps.headline: Fold a perfectly square piece of paper diagonally.
steps.description: When you're done, it'll be in the shape of a triangle.

steps.headline: Fold one corner to the center of the opposite side.
steps.description: Be sure to choose one of the two identical corners, not the third corner that's a perfect 90-degree angle.

steps.headline: Repeat with the other corner.
steps.description: The tops of the two folds will perfectly overlap when you're done.

steps.headline: Fold the top flaps down to create an opening in your paper cup.Tuck each flap in the previous folds.

text: Fold a perfectly square piece of paper diagonally. When you're done, it'll be in the shape of a triangle. Fold one corner to the center of the opposite side. Be sure to choose one of the two identical corners, not the third corner that's a perfect 90-degree angle. Repeat with the other corner. The tops of the two folds will perfectly overlap when you're done. Fold the top flaps down to create an opening in your paper cup.Tuck each flap in the previous folds.  Finished!
